review_body: I do love these chair socks. They match the color of our dining chairs. But they don’t always stay put. I’ve found if you have a chair (or two) that is used more frequently, being pulled in and out from under the table, they weaken the material and slide off the leg. I still continue to use the socks because they are keeping my hardwood floors from scratching but I wish they would have a bit more elastic in them to stay put on the legs.
Response:
**Support:** Thank you for sharing your feedback on the chair socks. To address the issue of them not staying put, we recommend the following steps:
1. Ensure the chair legs are clean and dry before applying the socks.
2. Consider reinforcing the socks with additional adhesive or grip pads for better stability.
3. If the issue persists, please contact our customer support team at [support@email.com] with more details. We value your input and will work to improve the product's design for better performance. Thank you for your continued support.

review_body: Had some problems getting it to work. The supplied cable was no good - would not charge the battery. When I replaced cable with my own was able to charge and then connect the device via bluetooth to a PC. Had trouble finding the PC software but when I emailed their support they responded within a day with the correct download info. PC program works well for testing the unit after you figure out which port to use (port 4 in my case). The accuracy and stability of the unit look very good for my application, however I was not able to connect to either an iPhone or iPad (tried several of each) via bluetooth. Will have to hard-wire if I decide to use this device in my product.
Response:
**Support:** Thank you for sharing your experience. To address the connectivity issues with your iPhone or iPad via Bluetooth, we recommend the following steps:
1. Ensure that the device's Bluetooth is enabled and in pairing mode.
2. Check for any available firmware updates for the device that may improve compatibility with iOS devices.
3. If Bluetooth connectivity continues to be a challenge, consider reaching out to our customer support team at [support@email.com] for further assistance or alternative solutions. We value your feedback and aim to enhance your experience with our product. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
